name: SudokuNX
author: ZetaDesigns
description:
SudokuNX is an open-source Sudoku game for the Nintendo Switch.

This was actually my first project with SDL2.

Features:
- create random Sudoku
- detect when Sudoku is solved

To-Do:
- Touchscreen input
- Difficulties

If you encounter any Issues or have feature requests feel free to open an Issue on the repository!

Special Thanks to @Doodil who helped me a lot with the generator!
